description: Technical advice for the consolidation of  the National Intersectoral Commission for Humanitarian Demining and Assistance capacities.

subproject.description: The project aims at strengthening the capacity of the Angolan government to assure the security and access of the population to mine-infested areas. Thus, it is expected that the National Intersectoral Commission for Humanitarian Demining and Assistance, at the end of the process, becomes an organization with functional, technical and institutional capacities capable of contributing to the achievement of the objectives set out in the National Mine Action Strategic Plan for 2006-2011.
subproject.title: Support to CNIDAH 2007-2008
